name: Arcane City: Chris Saffron goes to the Movies! (Kinetic Novel)
name_original: Arcane City: Chris Saffron goes to the Movies! (Kinetic Novel)
description:
A short kinetic novel set in the Arcane City Universe...... Set in the year 2017, Chris Saffron goes to see a movie! What will happen? Sit back, grab some popcorn, and enjoy!

18+, gore, violent themes
